description: Status Indicator lookup reference data for OPPS HCPCS crosswalks

ref_si_lookup.source: CMS OPPS I/OCE documentation and rule appendices

effective_dates.description: Effective from must be before effective to
effective_dates.rule: effective_from < effective_to OR effective_to IS NULL

completeness.description: All status indicators must have descriptions

accuracy.description: Status indicators must be valid and descriptions must be meaningful

row_content_hash.name: row_content_hash
row_content_hash.description: 64-character SHA-256 hex digest of row content per STD-parser-contracts v1.1 §5.2

changes: Updated row_content_hash pattern to 64-char SHA-256 digest
